mapper.sql: id, ddAppId, ddMinVersion, ddCombinationId, ddAllowedShow, ddWxBannerUnit, ddWxBannerTime, ddWxBannerAllowedShow, ddWxBannerStrategyId, ddWxBannerStrategyValue, ddWxIntUint, ddWxIntAllowedShow, ddWxIntStrategyId, ddWxIntStrategyValue, ddWxIntStrategyId, ddWxIntStrategyValue, ddWxReVideoUnit, ddWxReVideoAllowedShow, updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into config_ad_app (ddAppId, ddMinVersion, ddCombinationId, ddAllowedShow, ddWxBannerUnit, ddWxBannerTime, ddWxBannerAllowedShow, ddWxBannerStrategyId, ddWxBannerStrategyValue, ddWxIntUint, ddWxIntAllowedShow, ddWxIntStrategyId, ddWxIntStrategyValue, ddWxReVideoUnit, ddWxReVideoAllowedShow, updateTime) values (#{ddAppId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddMinVersion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddCombinationId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddAllowedShow, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{ddWxBannerUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddWxBannerTime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddWxBannerAllowedShow, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{ddWxBannerStrategyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddWxBannerStrategyValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddWxIntUint, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddWxIntAllowedShow, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{ddWxIntStrategyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddWxIntStrategyValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddWxReVideoUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddWxReVideoAllowedShow, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, NOW())
mapper.update: delete from config_ad_app where id in (${deleteIds})
update config_ad_app set ddAllowedShow = #{ddAllowedShow, jdbcType=BOOLEAN} where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
